title: Path traversal vulnerability: issue IDs used directly in filepath.Join without validation
close_reason: Fixed: added validateIssueID() rejecting IDs with /, \, .., or single dot. Called at entry of ReadIssue, WriteIssue, DeleteIssue. Tests: TestValidateIssueID (12 cases), TestWriteIssue_PathTraversal, TestDeleteIssue_PathTraversal, TestReadIssue_PathTraversal.
description:
Issue IDs are used directly in filepath.Join() without sanitization in WriteIssue, ReadIssue, DeleteIssue, and storage.go. An ID like '../../../etc/passwd' could escape .wong/issues/ and read/write arbitrary files.

File: wong_impl/internal/wongdb/wongdb.go, wong_impl/internal/wongdb/storage.go
